body:
Reverts #3250
Fixes #4577

See #4577 for backstory. #3250 and #4230 were developed separately, and pass the unit tests on their own. But when they are combined, they cause the modulecmd unit tests to fail. Reverting #3250 until the bugs are worked out. @becker33 Can you restore your #3250 branch and rebase off of develop and work out any bugs that have crept in?
title: Revert "Module cmd fix"
